articles.title: Kate Winslet: 'My daughter's generation can speak for themselves' - The Times
articles.description: Mare of Easttown changed the actress — it made her more picky about roles. She talks about taking charge of her career, acting with her daughter and why today’s young women are stronger and prouder of their bodies
